import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; class UserProfileForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.users = {'first_name': 'Riddhi Jain'}; this.createUser = this.createUser.bind(this); this.getUser = this.getUser.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { window.addEventListener('load', this.handleLoad); } createUser() { const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ "firstName": "Riddhi2", "lastName": "Jain", "email": "riddhi.jain+1@sjsu.edu", "identity_no": "abcdefghi+1", "dob": null, "address": null, "state": "california", "zipCode": null, "mobileNumber": null }) }; fetch('http://localhost:8080/users', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ users: data }) .catch(console.log)); } render() { return (

This email is invalid

); } } export default UserProfileForm;
